prompt:
Describe a situation where you had to make an important decision quickly. What was the outcome?
I recently faced an urgent situation while traveling on business where I needed to decide whether to continue my journey despite heavy rain warnings or postpone it until the next day due to safety concerns. After considering various factors such as transportation options, deadlines and potential risks, I decided to press ahead with my plans as public transport services were still operating albeit more slowly than usual. I took all necessary precautions including checking road conditions frequently via mobile apps en route and arrived safely at my destination within an hour later than expected due to heavy traffic caused by the weather conditions but managed nonetheless!
